import React from "react"; import Link from 'next/link' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Icon, Meta } from "antd"; const dummy = { nickname: '제로초', } const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { return (
노드버드 프로필 } actions={[ , , ]} > {dummy.nickname[0]}} title={dummy.nickname} description="This is the description" /> 두번째 세번째 {children}
) } AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node } export default AppLayout
